title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Design Course for Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and possession of fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Self-directed science inquiry learning utilizing diverse digital tools in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Students can structure and solve scientific questions using technological tools
Learners can refine inquiries by incorporating peer feedback through online collaboration platforms
Self-directed learning plans can be developed through personalized learning data analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
